page.title: 15Whittington Cricket Club
page.content: {Whittington Cricket Club}is on the outskirts of the village. The club was formed in 1858. To commemorate 125 years of village cricket in Whittington,a first day cover envelope was printed with the scorecard of the first match on it and a hand stamp.Some of the envelopes were signed by{Bob Willis}and{Andy Lloyd who have both played for England.In the past couple of years they have had an artifical pitch put in.Whittington Cricket Club have two teams, a first and a second eleven,which both play in the Border Counties League.During the season a local knockout competition is held between different parts of the village like work places,pubs and estates.In 1984 an 8 a side competition was held to mark the opening of the new artificial wicket.
